en.watering_low_desc: Plants like cacti and succulents that need watering once every 7-14 days.
en.watering_medium_desc: Most indoor plants are watered once every 3-5 days.
en.watering_high_desc: Tropical plants whose soil should always be moist.
en.watering_note_desc: Before watering, touch the soil. If the top 2-3 centimeters of soil are dry, it's time to water.
en.light_low_desc: Plants placed 2-3 meters from the window. Such as pothos and sansevieria.
en.light_medium_desc: Plants located 1-2 meters from the window with indirect light.
en.light_high_desc: Plants placed next to the window with direct sunlight. Such as cactus.
en.light_note_desc: Yellow leaves usually indicate too much light, and stretched leaves indicate insufficient light.
en.temp_suitable_desc: Most indoor plants grow at 18-24Â°C temperature.
en.humidity_desc: Tropical plants need high humidity. You can spray water or place the pot on a tray filled with pebbles and water.
en.temp_note_desc: Keep plants away from heaters and air conditioners.
en.fertilizing_time_desc: During growing season (spring and summer) once every 2-4 weeks.
en.fertilizer_type_desc: Liquid fertilizer for indoor plants at half the recommended concentration.
en.fertilizing_note_desc: Reduce or stop fertilizing in fall and winter.
en.pruning_leaves_desc: Regularly remove yellow and dry leaves.
en.cleaning_leaves_desc: Clean the leaves with a damp cloth every so often.
en.pot_change_desc: Change the pot every 1-2 years so the roots have more space.
en.aphids_desc: Wash leaves with soap and water solution.
en.root_rot_desc: Reduce watering and move the plant to drier soil.
en.pest_note_desc: Prevention is better than cure. Regularly check your plants.
en.pothos_desc: Very hardy plant with low water needs
en.sansevieria_desc: Low maintenance and tolerates low light
en.rubber_plant_desc: Large and beautiful plant with easy care
en.tags_placeholder: Separate with commas, e.g.: indoor plant, air purifier
en.no_plants: You haven't added any plants yet
en.no_plants_desc: Start by adding your first plant and care for it
en.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this plant?
en.reminders_alert: You have reminders for today! ğŸ””
